PERSONA:
james is a 68-year-old married african american man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has been a citizen his entire life. james is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and considers himself a moderate protestant democrat.

despite his age, james is an active internet user, going online several times a day. he is a dedicated member of his church, attending religious services more than once a week. james comes from a middle-income family, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually.

politically, he aligns himself with the moderate and conservative wings of the democratic party. james is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously. while he doesn't consider himself a born-again or evangelical christian, his faith plays a significant role in his life.

in his free time, james enjoys various activities, though he preferred not to disclose whether he participates in voluntary work. overall, he leads a comfortable life, balancing his religious beliefs, political views, and modern lifestyle in the metropolitan area where he resides.
